remarks: Lemma for ~ nobndup and ~ nobnddown .  The infimum of the class of all ordinals such that ` A ` is not ` X ` is an ordinal.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Aug-2011.)
statement:
nobndlem4.1 $e |- X e. { 1o , 2o } $.
nobndlem4 $p |- ( A e. No -> |^| { x e. On | ( A ` x ) =/= X } e. On ) $.
$d A x $.
$d X x $.
